entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
